item.description: Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0263; 04:27AM; 9927 S Wilmington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DRofaB; Watts; One vehicle into structure. One patient determined dead on scene and one transported in critical condition. (Age/gender unknown). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 667. No further details. ; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; E264 E65 RA264 RA65 RA864 RA865 T64; CH4; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0088; 01:52AM; 150 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNYlYb; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 mins with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the first floor. The primary and secondary searches found no occupants. No further details. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E211 E229 E52 E6 RA52 RA6 T11 T29; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0088; 01:33AM; 150 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNYlYb; Koreatown; Mixed one and two story single family dwelling (possible duplex) with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E211 E229 E52 E6 RA52 RA6 T11 T29; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0622; 11:42AM; 3772 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JMXpTO; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 32 mins with no injuries reported. The was some damage (extend unknown) to the exposed building on the Bravo side. No further details; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E15 E215 E226 E26 E294 E34 EM1 RA15 RA834 RA94 T15 T26 T94; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0622; 11:10AM; 3772 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JMXpTO; Exposition Park; A detached garage, to the rear of a single family dwelling, is well involved in fire with another structure exposed on the Bravo side. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E15 E215 E226 E26 E294 E34 EM1 RA15 RA834 RA94 T15 T26 T94; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0370; 08:17AM; 1051 N Stone St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uMP2DQ; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes. Their quick action contained the fire to primarily one room with no extension to the attic. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E16 E202 E203 E25 RA25 RA804 T2 T3 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0370; 08:06AM; 1051 N Stone St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uMP2DQ; Boyle Heights; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and initial reports are of one room involved. There are no other buildings exposed. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E16 E202 E203 E25 RA25 RA804 T2 T3 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0170; 06:40AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; Building status update: The building has 287 units, at least 24 will lose power. The fire extended up the walls of the building and damaged six units. Five of those units will not be habitable. LADWP is evaluating the situation and has not yet determined an ETA for repairing the electrical panels to safely restore power. Los Angeles Red Cross is responding to assist with the displaced residents (Five adult males, three adult females and one child). LAFD Arson is on scene conducting the cause investigation. No further details and no further updates are anticipated.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0170; 04:50AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN: After an extensive operation searching out fire traveling vertically within the walls, 92 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in one hour and 47 mins . The building has two separate power systems which will allow for the power to be shut off to the affected panel feeding the Bravo (south) side of the building and leave power available on the Delta (north) side. Officers are making the determination as to which units are no longer safe for occupancy and how many residents need to be re-housed. No injuries reported. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E103 E239 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E75 E81 E89 E90 EA1 EA2 EM14 EM15 HR3 PI4 RA81 RA889 RA89 RA90 T39 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0170; 04:44AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; Firefighters are continuing to work through the building and ensure no fire remains in the walls. (official knockdown not yet declared). The fire started near the electrical panels which has compromised the electrical system in the building. LADWP is shutting down power to the building, which holds approximately 100 units. LAFD PIO Captain Branden Silverman is responding to assist and for media availability. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E103 E239 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E75 E81 E89 E90 EA1 EA2 EM14 EM15 HR3 PI4 RA81 RA889 RA89 RA90 T39 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart
